title: Type A
desc: Individuals with Type A blood have A antigens on their red blood cells and B antibodies in their plasma.

title: Type B
desc: Individuals with Type A blood have A antigens on their red blood cells and B antibodies in their plasma.

title: Type AB
desc: Individuals with Type A blood have A antigens on their red blood cells and B antibodies in their plasma.

title: Type O
desc: Individuals with Type A blood have A antigens on their red blood cells and B antibodies in their plasma.

title: Rh-Positive
desc: Red blood cells have the Rh antigen.

title: Rh-Negative
desc: Red blood cells lack the Rh antigen.
